What we did Working principles

User needs

User need #1

As a risk expert
I need to be able to help people manage risk in the right way
So they can improve their chances of success

User need #2

As a Co-op manager
I need to know what may negatively impact my area
So that I can take steps to reduce the impact

User need #3

As a Co-op manager
I need to feel confident that my team are managing our risks
So that I can get on with delivering, and not feel I need to worry about risk

User need #4

As a Co-op manager
I need to be able to see all risks that could impact my areas
So we can take action to reduce the impact and likelihood

User need #5

As a risk business partner
I need to be able to see areas I’m responsible for are managing risk well
So I can step in when needed and provide assurance to senior managers

User need #6

When I’m managing risk
I need to be able to demonstrate we’re doing the right things
So that people don’t stop us from progressing

User need #7

When I’m managing risk
I need everyone to be able to update their own areas of responsibility
So that I don’t have to waste time and effort gathering them all together

User need #8

When I’m managing risk
I need to be able to find and interrogate all the relevant data to me, my area and my role
So that I can improve my understanding and identify patterns

User need #9

When I’m managing my risks
I need to know and share what the risk roles and responsibilities are
So that it’s clear who should do what

User need #10

When I’m managing my risks
I need to be able to work in the most efficient way possible
So that I’m not wasting time on things that don’t add value

User need #11

When I’m managing risk
I need to be able to identify and record links and interdependencies
So that I can build a clearer picture of the landscape

User need #12

When I’m managing risk
I need help to remember what needs doing and when
So that I can take the right action at the right time

User need #13

When I’m managing risk
I need to know that I’m doing the right thing
So that I don’t feel worried or concerned

User need #14

When I’m managing risk
I need to feel I’m doing a good job
So that I feel a sense of purpose and reward

User need #15

When I’m managing my risks
I need to know what to do and how to do it
So that I can manage the risks in the most appropriate way

User need #16

As a risk colleague
I need to be able to influence decisions that impact me my role and the tools we use.
So that I can ensure they help me work efficiently and effectively.

User need #17

As a risk colleague
I need to understand why I’m being asked to work in a certain way.
So that I can recognise the benefits and can act on it accordingly.

User need #18

As a risk colleague
I need help to follow the correct processes and procedures,
so that I do my job right

User need #19

As someone working on risk
I need to be able to speak to and connect with my peers
So that I can talk things through and not feel isolated

User need #20

When I’m working on risk
I need to be able to communicate and share information with people in a clear and concise way.
So that they can understand and act on the information.
